TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TypedTableBaseExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class TypedTableBaseExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含 類別的擴充方法。

span.span: Contains the extension methods for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別包含定義的靜態擴充方法方法和標準的查詢作業的具型別資料集。The class contains static extension methods that define the method and standard query operations for typed data sets. 無法執行個體化這個類別。This class cannot be instantiated.

span.span: Standard Query Operators Overview
Querying Typed DataSets

param.name: source
param.span: ，包含要對其叫用轉換函式的 項目。

span.span: A that contains the elements to invoke a transformation function upon.

param.name: selector
param.span: 要套用至各個項目的轉換函式。

span.span: A transformation function to apply to each element.

summary.span: 將 的各個項目投影成一個新的表單。

span.span: Projects each element of a into a new form.

returns.span: ，其項目是對 的各個項目叫用轉換函式的結果。

span.span: An whose elements are the result of invoking the transformation function on each element of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此投影方法需要的轉換函式`selector`，以產生中來源序列中，每個值的一個值`source`。This projection method requires the transformation function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`傳回值，本身就是集合，取用者必須以手動方式周遊子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, the consumer must traverse the sub-sequences manually.
